About Me

BIO

I am a sophomore B. Tech Computer Engineering undergraduate . I have experience of working with Data Structures and Algorithms (Java, C), Web Development (MERN, Django) ,Game Development (Unity Engine , C#, Blender ) , Web App (React) Android App( Kotlin ) & Machine Learning (Python, TensorFlow) and am a security freak. What I might lack in vast experience but I make up for with my determination to learn. I am open to exploring new things and new opportunities!
